TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AUHostTransportStateFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates flag values that describe the state of an audio transport.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioUnit.AUHostTransportStateFlags Changed = unsigned int64(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that state change has occured, such as a stop, start, seek, or other change since the host transport state block was last called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioUnit.AUHostTransportStateFlags Cycling = unsigned int64(8)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the host is cycling.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioUnit.AUHostTransportStateFlags Moving = unsigned int64(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the transport is moving.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.AudioUnit.AUHostTransportStateFlags Recording = unsigned int64(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the host is able to record, or is currently recording.
